    private void
    activateButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    At the beginning there are 2 visible choice boxes : we need to enable the button only if all choice boxes don't contain null if users select "Island" in second choice box, the third choice box is set visible, and contains the available island numbers

      private void activateButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
